pages_content.content:
Chapter 4. Capitalization
· Time zones are not capitalized:
eastern standard time
mountain daylight time
noon
But
Greenwich mean time
Pacific standard time
4.5.6. Scientific Names
In several scientific disciplines, there are conventions for capitalization of
names, for example, the names of celestial bodies in astronomy and the
names of soil groups in geology.
· Geologic names
Upper Cambrian Period, Bronze Age (geologic periods)
Laterite, Tundra (soil groups)
· Names of celestial bodies
North Star, Halley's Comet
Venus, Earth (the planet)
the Sun, the Moon (Earth's)
But
earth (the ground)
moons of Jupiter
· Biological names
Arthropoda (phylum)
Crustacea (class)
Hypoparia (order)
Agnostidae (family)
Agnostus (genus)
But
canadensis (species)
Consult CBE (1978) or other specialized references for details of capitaliza-
tion of biological names.
92
